statements: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_time, query_text FROM logs WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT query_text, log_time FROM logs WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, log_time, is_suspicious FROM logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE is_suspicious = FALSE ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, log_time FROM logs WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT query_text FROM logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, user_id FROM logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 10;
SELECT log_id, user_id, query_text FROM logs WHERE query_text ILIKE '%error%' AND is_suspicious = TRUE ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM logs;
SELECT log_id, db_user FROM logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM logs;
SELECT DISTINCT db_user FROM logs ORDER BY db_user DESC;
SELECT log_id, query FROM logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT log_id, log_time, db_user, query FROM logs WHERE log_time > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE db_user = 'admin'
SELECT log_id, log_time, query FROM logs WHERE db_user = 'guest' ORDER BY log_time DESC
SELECT logs.log_id, logs.log_time, security_alerts.alert_type FROM logs INNER JOIN security_alerts ON logs.log_id = security_alerts.log_id
SELECT log_id, query FROM logs WHERE query LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM suspicious_activity WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT query_text FROM logs WHERE id = 100;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND breach_type = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT SUM(affected_records) AS total_affected_records FROM security_breaches;
SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT query_text, timestamp FROM suspicious_activity WHERE severity >= 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM security_breaches GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT breach_type, MAX(affected_records) FROM security_breaches GROUP BY breach_type;
SELECT user_id, AVG(severity) AS avg_severity FROM suspicious_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(severity) > 2;
SELECT * FROM logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, username FROM logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, action FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_details WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT event_type, description FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, details FROM suspicious_activity WHERE username = 'john.doe'
SELECT id, action, details FROM logs WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM logs;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT db_name FROM databases WHERE db_id = '8f88db08-2d25-4c47-979c-0b911fb4b075';
SELECT * FROM activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM logs;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT db_id, db_name FROM databases WHERE db_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM activities WHERE user_id = '12345' AND db_id = '67890';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description, event_timestamp FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
